description:
Jon Wertheim reports on the WNBA's breakthrough season, with a rookie class that has made a seamless transition from college to the pros. Wertheim speaks to Rookie of the Year Caitlin Clark, who is the driving force behind this growth, but not the
 only one.
title: Welcome to the W | Sunday on 60 Minutes

description: In 2015, Sharyn Alfonsi investigated allegations that thousands of homeowners were underpaid for their flood insurance claims after Hurricane Sandy because engineering reports on damaged houses were altered.
title: The Storm after the Storm: Underpaid flood insurance claims | 60 Minutes Archive

description: Bigger bins and premium-priced seating with added legroom are just some of the changes the carrier is betting will win over customers.
title: Southwest is renovating its cabins. Here's what the planes will look like.

description: After a year-long investigation, Sharyn Alfonsi reveals how an estimated 50,000 homeowners affected by Hurricane Ian are still fighting with their insurance companies to repair their homes. Alfonsi interviews insurance insiders and whistleblowers who say several insurance carriers were in some cases using materially altered damage reports which resulted in dramatically lower claim payouts. 60 Minutes, Sunday.
title: After the Hurricane | Sunday on 60 Minutes

description: Trade in that old, bulky vacuum for a slimmer, easily maneuverable stick vacuum from brands like Samsung and Dyson.
title: Best stick vacuums for keeping a mess-free house this fall

description: From top-rated smart mugs to cold brew starter kits, we've rounded up the coffee lover presents to gift this Christmas.
title: The best Christmas gifts for coffee lovers in 2024

description: These gifts from Stanley, Apple, AllTrails and more won't bust your budget.
title: The best Christmas gifts under $50 in 2024

description: Check out these fun, unique stocking stuffer ideas from Apple, Sony, Jellycat and more that'll make Christmas merry and bright.
title: 17 best stocking stuffers for the whole family for Christmas 2024

description: Hezbollah says it is launching retaliatory rockets into northern Israel following Israel's largest round of airstrikes to date in Beirut on Friday. The Israeli military says it struck Hezbollah's headquarters in the southern part of the city. U.S. Secretary of State Antony Blinken addressed the attack and other global issues while speaking to reporters in New York City.
title: Blinken discusses Israeli strike on alleged Hezbollah headquarters, more

description: Discover if it's worth upgrading to the new Apple iPhone 16 Pro Max or if you should stick with your current iPhone
title: Is Apple iPhone 16 Pro Max worth the upgrade? Hands-on review

description: Three Iranian hackers are being accused of targeting former President Donald Trump's presidential campaign. CBS News legal contributor Jessica Levinson has more on the unsealed indictment.
title: Iranian hackers accused of targeting Trump

description: Tropical Depression Helene is moving north through Georgia and the Carolinas. Flash flood warnings are in effect across the Peach State, with some areas potentially seeing up to eight inches of rain by Friday night. Skip Henderson, mayor of Columbus, Georgia, joins CBS News to discuss how the storm is impacting his community.
title: Mayor of Columbus, Georgia, discusses Helene aftermath

description: The Viking burial ground, used during the 9th and 10th centuries, was discovered on the southern outskirts of the village of Åsum.
title: 50 "exceptionally well-preserved" Viking skeletons unearthed in Denmark

description: The Israeli military says it struck the central headquarters of Hezbollah in Beirut, and sources told The Associated Press that Hezbollah leader Hassan Nasrallah​ was the target.
title: Israel says it struck Hezbollah's headquarters in huge blast in Beirut

description: Portions of Florida and Georgia are underwater after Helene made landfall as a Category 4 hurricane Thursday night. The storm quickly weakened, but not before causing major flooding and widespread power outages. CBS News correspondent Tom Hanson has the latest from Tallahassee, Florida.
title: Helene sends trees tumbling into Florida homes

description: A risky rescue operation is underway to evacuate over 50 people stranded by fast-moving flood waters on the roof of a hospital in Erwin, in eastern Tennessee.
title: Rescue operation underway for dozens stranded on Tennessee hospital roof

description: Former President Donald Trump sat down with Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelenskyy in New York on Friday ahead of a campaign trip to Michigan later in the day. CBS News campaign reporter Olivia Rinaldi has more on the meeting and Trump's stops in the Great Lakes State.
title: Trump meets with Zelenskyy ahead of Michigan campaign stops

description: Rising Florida home insurance rates, which surged 45% from 2017 to 2022, are likely to keep climbing along with the mercury, experts say.
title: Hurricane Helene hits homeowners already facing soaring insurance costs

description:
Jim Cantore tells CBS News' Tom Hanson about what made Hurricane Helene different from the 113 other storms he's covered — and how a sudden shift east saved Tallahassee from the worst storm it would have ever experienced.

"This seems to be the spot, all of a sudden, for Mother Nature's wrath."
title: Jim Cantore explains how Florida's Big Bend has become the spot for "Mother Nature's wrath"

description: Vice President Kamala Harris will campaign in Arizona on Friday and is expected to call for tougher border security measures while there. It will be her first visit to the U.S.-Mexico border since becoming the Democratic presidential nominee. CBS News immigration and politics reporter Camilo Montoya-Galvez has a preview of Harris' agenda.
title: Harris expected to call for tougher border measures during Arizona visit

description: Before you tap into your home equity, it's important to understand what your monthly payments could look like now.
title: How much would a $100,000 home equity loan cost per month now that rates are cut?

description: Israel reportedly struck Hezbollah in Lebanon on the same day Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu addressed the United Nations General Assembly. CBS News' Imtiaz Tyab reports from Beirut, and CBS News' Olivia Gazis has more from New York City.
title: Israel strikes Lebanon after Netanyahu addresses United Nations

description: New York City Mayor Eric Adams pleads not guilty to federal bribery and wire fraud charges; Dockworkers from Maine to Texas threaten to strike next week.
title: 9/27: CBS News 24/7 Episode 2

description: Despite suspending his campaign, the independent presidential candidate was fighting to have his name restored to the state's ballot.
title: Supreme Court denies RFK Jr.'s bid to be reinstated to New York ballot

description: In this preview of an interview to be broadcast on "CBS Sunday Morning" September 29, correspondent Anthony Mason talks with Chris Martin and Jonny Buckland of the rock band Coldplay about their massively-successful world tour.
title: Preview: Chris Martin and Jonny Buckland of Coldplay

description: New York City Mayor Eric Adams appeared in court Friday and pleaded not guilty to federal charges against him. CBS News' Nikki Battiste was in court while the Adams' arraignment took place.
title: New York City Mayor Eric Adams pleads not guilty to federal charges

description: A HELOC may not have been the best way to access your home equity in recent years, but it could be now. Here's why.
title: Why a HELOC could be best for homeowners this October

description: Hurricane Helene battered Florida before it became a tropical storm sweeping through Georgia. Six governors have declared states of emergency. CBS News' Dave Malkoff reports from Atlanta.
title: Hurricane Helene slams Florida's Gulf Coast, dumps rain across Southeast

description: Bigger bins and more leg room are just some of the changes Southwest Airlines is betting will be big with customers.
title: Southwest Airlines redesigned its cabin interiors. Here's what the planes look like.

description: Vice Presidential candidates JD Vance and Tim Walz are set to debate on CBS News before the November election. This comes as Vice President Kamala Harris travels to the U.S.-Mexico border and Donald Trump meets with Ukraine's Volodymyr Zelenskyy. CBS News' Nikole Killion and Camilo Montoya-Galvez report.
title: Vance-Walz debate rules set as Trump, Harris hit campaign trail

description: A NASA astronaut and a Russian cosmonaut will join the Starliner astronauts for a normal tour of duty
title: Crew Dragon set for first Cape Canaveral launch to space station

description: The car attempted to make a pass on a two-lane road and struck two other vehicles, the state Highway Patrol said Friday.
title: 7 people killed in fiery car crash in North Carolina, troopers say

description: Loophole in law means potentially deadly furniture is still being sold by major retailers, advocacy group cautions.
title: Amazon, Walmart still sell older dressers that pose tip-over risk, CR finds

description: The price of gold has broken numerous price records already this year. Here's how to capitalize on that growth now.
title: How to capitalize on gold's record price surge

description: Dame Maggie Smith has died at age 89. In 2013, she spoke to Steve Kroft about acting, aging and the phenomenon of the dowager Countess of Grantham, her "Downton Abbey" character.
title: Dame Maggie Smith | 60 Minutes Archive

description: Hurricane Helene's force in Florida left behind major destruction in the Big Bend area before weakening into a tropical storm while it traveled through Georgia. CBS News' Dave Malkoff reports from Atlanta. Also, Ken Graham, the director at NOAA's National Weather Service, joins CBS News with more on damage.
title: How Hurricane Helene battered Florida

description: Co-hosts Tony Dokoupil and Adriana Diaz share a preview of what you can expect when "CBS Mornings Plus" launches Monday, Sept. 30.
title: "CBS Mornings Plus" debuts third hour of live coverage Monday

description: Consolidating your debt could be a smart move, but you should know what the extra fees and costs are first.
title: How much does credit card debt consolidation cost?

description: A simple cocktail recipe, from the author of the New York Times bestseller, "Barefoot Contessa at Home."
title: Recipe: Ina Garten's Fresh Whiskey Sours

description: New York City Mayor Eric Adams was arraigned Friday, a day after a federal indictment outlined alleged crimes Adams carried out involving a foreign government. CBS News' Nikki Battiste was in court.
title: New York City Mayor Eric Adams arraigned

description: There are no coastal watches or warnings in effect for either storm however, the waves from Issac could cause life-threatening surf and rip current conditions in the Azores
title: Hurricane Isaac strengthens, Tropical Storm Joyce forms in the Atlantic

description: Officials claim the changes "had no bearing" on Boar's Head's now-shuttered plant.
title: USDA had cut back on listeria testing, ahead of deadly Boar's Head outbreak

description: Here are the rules of the CBS News vice presidential debate between JD Vance and Tim Walz.
title: How the VP debate rules will work for the Walz-Vance 2024 showdown

description: In October 2022, Pheobe Plummer and Anna Holland threw two cans of Heinz tomato soup over the artwork at London's National Gallery.
title: Activists who threw soup on van Gogh's "Sunflowers" painting sentenced

description: If you're at risk of defaulting on your credit card debt, you may want to consider these strategies now.
title: Worried about defaulting on your credit card debt? Here's what to do

description: Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu addressed the United Nations General Assembly Friday as his country fights Hezbollah in Lebanon and Hamas in Gaza. Netanyahu blamed Iran and its support for Hezbollah and Hamas for the problems in the region.
title: Israel's Netanyahu addresses U.N. amid conflicts with Hezbollah, Hamas

description: A CBS News investigation looks into internet romance scams that are targeting Americans, tracking them to Ghana, where many of the scams begin. Debora Patta shows how men and women who are looking for love online are tricked into sending money.
title: CBS News investigation tracks internet romance scams targeting Americans to Ghana

description: Helene slams Florida, leaves behind trail of destruction; Trump, Zelenskyy meet at Trump Tower in New York City.
title: 9/27: CBS News 24/7 Episode 1

description: The Coast Guard rescued a man and his dog who were sailing off the coast on Sanibel Island as Hurricane Helene approached Florida. Also, CBS News Philadelphia Grant Gilmore has the latest forecast.
title: Coast Guard rescues man, dog during Hurricane Helene surge

description: Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu addressed the United Nations General Assembly Friday, remaining undefiant about Israel's operations in the Middle East that appear to be escalating. CBS News' Olivia Gazis has more.
title: Netanyahu's unrepentant speech at United Nations

description: Grocery costs barely rose last month, according to Friday's report, and energy costs dropped 0.8%, led by cheaper gasoline.
title: Key U.S. inflation gauge shows prices continued cooling in August

description: Enrique Ariza was convicted of "persecution, harassment" and other crimes against Claudia Julieta Duque, the prosecutor's office said.
title: Ex-intelligence chief jailed for "aggravated torture" of journalist

description: Hurricane Helene left damage behind in Tallahassee, Florida, and other areas close to the Gulf of Mexico. Tom Hanson reports. Also, FEMA Administrator Deanne Criswell joins CBS News with more on federal response for those affected.
title: Hurricane Helene pounds Florida, FEMA administrator on recovery

description: New York City Mayor Eric Adams is set to be arraigned Friday on federal charges that include bribery, conspiracy and campaign finance charges. CBS News' Anna Schecter reports.
title: Eric Adams set to be arraigned on federal charges

description: U.K. regulators found "serious misconduct" by Naomi Campbell's Fashion for Relief charity, disqualifying her from running a charity in Britain for five years.
title: Naomi Campbell banned from running U.K. charity over "serious misconduct"

description: Home equity loan rates are cooling. Here's how much a $20,000 home equity loan will cost per month now.
title: How much would a $20,000 home equity loan cost per month now that rates are cut?

description: Vice President Kamala Harris is visiting the U.S.-Mexico border Friday as former President Donald Trump meets with Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelenskyy in New York. CBS News' Caitlin Huey-Burns reports.
title: Kamala Harris headed to the border, Trump meets with Zelenskyy

description: Hurricane Helene made landfall in Florida Friday before weakening in Georgia. CBS News' Manuel Bojorquez is in Tampa and Skyler Henry is in Asheville, Tennessee, where winds gusts and flooding are prevalent. Also, CBS News New York meteorologist Tony Sadiku has the latest weather forecast.
title: Tropical Storm Helene sweeps through Georgia

description: Big Ten football is back on CBS, but this season, thanks to Abbott, there's more at stake than just school pride. The healthcare giant has teamed up with the Big Ten for a blood donation competition. We caught up with Tom Brady at Big Ten headquarters to talk about "The We Give Blood Drive" and the $1 million prize on the line. To find a blood donation center near you and to learn more about "The We Give Blood Drive," you can visit bigten.org/abbott. The winning school will be announced at the Big Ten Championship Game in December.
title: Abbott, Big Ten kick off blood drive with a $1M prize

description: These tips will help you find the most affordable coverage offering the protection your pet deserves
title: How to get cheap pet insurance, according to veterinarians

description: With the U.S. facing a critical blood shortage, Dr. Jennifer Ashton shares the life-saving impact of blood donations.
title: Dr. Jennifer Ashton on blood donation benefits

description: With the Fed expected to cut rates a few more times, borrowing money is about to get cheaper.
title: These loans will become cheaper as the Fed cuts rates

description: Kendy Howard, a 48-year-old wife and mother, was found dead in her bathtub with a gunshot wound to the head. Evidence at the scene led investigators to take a hard look at her husband, a former Idaho state trooper. Did he have the know-how to get away with murder? Correspondent Peter Van Sant has a preview of this week's all-new "48 Hours."
title: "48 Hours" reports on suspicious bathtub death of Idaho mom

description: In the latest "Kindness 101" segment, Steve Hartman and his kids tell the story of a young girl who finds inspiration in an unexpected figure, teaching us all about admiration.
title: Kindness 101: Young girl finds unlikely hero

description: City officials shared clips of boats slammed into homes and a residence burning amid the floodwaters as they conducted water rescue operations.
title: Hurricane Helene videos show massive flooding and rescue efforts

description: City officials shared clips of boats slammed into homes and a residence burning amid the floodwaters as they conducted water rescue operations.
title: Hurricane Helene videos show massive flooding and rescue efforts

description: At least 25,000 dockworkers at East and Gulf Coast ports could walk off the job next week, impacting about half of the country's imports and possibly sending prices higher for consumers. Negotiations between the workers' union and the employers face a Tuesday deadline.
title: Here's how a port strike could impact what you buy as deadline for a deal looms

description: Hurricane Helene, now a tropical storm, marks the third time in just over a year that a tropical system has hit Florida's northeastern Gulf Coast. The storm, which made landfall as a Category 4 hurricane, has been blamed for at least three deaths so far as it moves over Georgia.
title: Helene is third tropical system in a year to hit Florida's northeastern Gulf Coast

description: Israel's leader softens his stance on a U.S.-backed cease-fire proposal with Hezbollah, but deadly strikes in Lebanon continue before his U.N. speech.
title: Deadly strikes in Lebanon go on as Netanyahu shifts tone on cease-fire

description: Lebanon's Ministry of Health says more than 700 people have been killed over the past week of intense Israeli strikes as Israel and Hezbollah continue to trade fire. Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu has so far rejected a U.S.-backed cease-fire proposal.
title: Efforts stall to reach cease-fire between Israel and Hezbollah

description: British actress Dame Maggie Smith had an extensive career in theater and movies, gaining international acclaim in later roles in "Harry Potter" and "Downton Abbey."
title: Maggie Smith, "Harry Potter" and "Downton Abbey" actress, has died at 89

description: Many Americans are unaware of the connection between drinking and cancer risk, despite growing research that points to the negative health impacts of alcohol.
title: Alcohol can increase your cancer risk. Here's what experts want you to know.

description: On Friday, Vice President Kamala Harris will be in Arizona to visit the U.S.-Mexico border. She plans to criticize former President Donald Trump for his role in blocking a bipartisan border security and immigration bill earlier this year. Meanwhile Trump will be in New York, meeting with Ukraine's President Volodymyr Zelenskyy before heading to Michigan.
title: Harris to visit U.S.-Mexico border while Trump meets with Ukraine's Zelenskyy

description: Tony Dokoupil and Adriana Diaz co-host "CBS Mornings Plus," airing weekdays on CBS-owned stations in Los Angeles, Chicago, San Francisco, Detroit and Miami, and streaming on CBS News 24/7.
title: "CBS Mornings Plus" debuts third hour of live coverage on Monday, Sept. 30

description: New York City Mayor Eric Adams will be arraigned in court Friday on federal corruption charges. The Democrat is accused of taking illegal campaign contributions and bribes from officials in Turkey in exchange for favors dating back a decade.
title: NYC Mayor Eric Adams to be arraigned on federal bribery charges

description: Hurricane Helene brought maximum sustained winds up to 140 mph and catastrophic storm surges up to 20 feet along Florida's Big Bend region as it made landfall Thursday as a Category 4 storm. At least three people have been killed.
title: Hurricane Helene makes landfall over Florida's Big Bend area as a Category 4 storm

description: Stephanie Abrams with The Weather Channel explains the threats posed by now Tropical Storm Helene as the large storm system passes through the Southeast, stretching from Georgia to Virginia.
title: What to know about Helene's path after it hit Florida as a Category 4 hurricane

description: As Helene weakens, it is still expected to bring heavy rain and winds to other parts of the southeast. A major area of flooding concern is the French Broad River in Asheville, North Carolina. It's expected to continue to rise throughout the day due to the rain from Helene and lead to potential historic flooding.
title: Helene weakens to a tropical storm as it heads toward Carolinas

description: Over 1 million customers are without power in Florida after Hurricane Helene tore through the state. The now tropical storm barreled into Florida's Gulf Coast, delivering powerful storm surge spanning hundreds of miles, from Fort Myers to the Panhandle.
title: Floridians assess the damage after Hurricane Helene slams the Sunshine State

description: Video shows a Coast Guard member descending into the choppy ocean from a helicopter to reach the man and dog.
title: Video shows rescue of man, dog sailing during Hurricane Helene

description: Scenes of utter destruction along Florida's northern Gulf Coast after Helene barrels into the state. Also, New York Mayor Eric Adams is scheduled to appear in court today after prosecutors laid out corruption charges. All that and all that matters in today's Eye Opener.
title: Eye Opener: Helene causes mass destruction as it tears through Florida

description: Former President Donald Trump is slamming Vice President Kamala Harris ahead of her trip to the U.S.-Mexico border where she is expected to touch upon security measures. CBS News campaign reporter Olivia Rinaldi has more.
title: Trump slams Harris ahead of her U.S.-Mexico border visit

description: Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu is addressing the United Nations General Assembly Friday after rejecting a cease-fire proposal offered by the U.S. and European officials, the Associated Press reports. CBS News' Chris Livesay has more.
title: Netanyahu to U.N. after rejecting new cease-fire proposal

description: Hurricane Helene entered Florida as a Category 4 storm and slammed the Big Bend coast with massive storm surges. CBS News' Jason Allen and Dave Malkoff report, and CBS News New York meteorologist Tony Sadiku has more on the weather.
title: Latest news on Hurricane Helene after slamming Florida as Category 4 storm

description: Investigators say the suspicious timing of doing a load of laundry and a call to 911 focused their attention on a former state trooper and his potential role in his wife's death.
title: Dryer cycle becomes key clue at the scene of an Idaho mother's death

description: A search of Brian Crossman Jr.'s cell phone found multiple internet searches related to serial killers and unresolved murders, police said.
title: Details emerge on suspect after 3 family members killed in Vermont

description: NYC Mayor Eric Adams is scheduled to appear in court today after his indictment on federal bribery and wire fraud charges.
title: NYC Mayor Eric Adams faces arraignment on federal indictment

description: The U.S. official said it was "not surprising" that China's navy would conceal it. The submarine's current status is unknown.
title: New Chinese nuclear attack submarine sank, U.S. officials says

description: "I don't think we know who's going to win Michigan yet," Rep. Debbie Dingell told chief Washington correspondent Major Garrett on "The Takeout" podcast.
title: Michigan will remain competitive until Election Day, Rep. Debbie Dingell predicts

description: Vice President Kamala Harris will deliver remarks in Douglas, Arizona, her first trip to the U.S.-Mexico border since becoming the Democratic nominee for president.
title: Harris to call for tougher security measures during trip to southern border

description: Hurricane Helene has made landfall in Florida, about 10 miles away from Perry. The Category 4 storm is now expected to head north through Georgia, where it will carry dangerous winds and flooding that could lead to landslides in southern Appalachia.
title: Hurricane Helene makes landfall in Florida as Category 4 storm

description: Southeast braces for powerful Hurricane Helene; Inside an elaborate romance scam that cost a U.S. man $700,000
title: 9/26: CBS Evening News
